Package org.vladislavb.onemediatesttask.service.impl

Class UserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.vladislavb.onemediatesttask.service.impl.UserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserService
@Service public class UserServiceImpl extends Object implements UserService
Implementation of the UserService interface. This service provides user authentication, token management, and user retrieval operations.
Author:
Vladislav Baryshev
